named-query.name: seguimiento.get.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from Seguimiento o where o.auditoria.audId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1 order by o.segFecInicio ASC

named-query.name: recomendacion.get.all.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from Recomendacion o where o.auditoria.audId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1 order by o.cedulaNota.cedId

named-query.name: comentario.by.recomendacion
named-query.query: select o from Comentario o where o.recomendacion.recId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: hallazgos.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from CedulaNota o where o.auditoria.audId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1
